org.hibernate.search.bridge.util.impl

Class EncodingStringBridge<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.bridge.util.impl.EncodingStringBridge<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EncodingBridge, StringBridge
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElasticsearchCalendarBridge, ElasticsearchDateBridge, ElasticsearchTemporalAccessorStringBridge

    public abstract class EncodingStringBridge<T>
extends Object
implements EncodingBridge, StringBridge
    A base class for EncodingBridges that encode values as Strings using a specific format.
    Author:
    Yoann Rodiere

      • getEncodingType

        public NumericFieldSettingsDescriptor.NumericEncodingType getEncodingType()
        Description copied from interface: EncodingBridge
        Define the numeric encoding to use for the brdige.
        Specified by:
        getEncodingType in interface EncodingBridge
        Returns:
        the encoding to use for this bridge, or NumericFieldSettingsDescriptor.NumericEncodingType.UNKNOWN if this bridge does not use numeric encoding.

      • parseIndexNullAs

        protected abstract T parseIndexNullAs(String indexNullAs)
                               throws IllegalArgumentException
        Parse the 'indexNullAs' string to an indexable value.

        The required format does not have to be the same as the encoded format.

        Parameters:
        indexNullAs - The string to parse.
        Returns:
        The encoded value for the given string.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the given string does not match the required format.

      • createNullMarker

        public NullMarker createNullMarker(String indexNullAs)
                            throws IllegalArgumentException
        Specified by:
        createNullMarker in interface EncodingBridge
        Parameters:
        indexNullAs - The value of Field.indexNullAs().
        Returns:
        The marker to use when a value is missing.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If indexNullAs cannot be encoded in the required format.
